nodes.text: Lefry Kaonai was a male Nautolan excavator who was part of a Republic archaeological team led by Doctor Kerrian that ventured in the Deep Cradle on the planet Voss. Unlucky, the entire expedition went insane; Lefry did not share their fate only because he had undertaken a Voss ritual that protected him from the influence of the Nightmare Lands. He was later saved by the arrival of the Barsen'thor and the mystic-in training Gaden-Ko.
